verse: As He was going out of the temple complex, one of His disciples said to Him, “Teacher, look! What massive stones! What impressive buildings!”
Jesus said to him, “Do you see these great buildings? Not one stone will be left here on another that will not be thrown down!”

header: Signs of the End of the Age

verse: While He was sitting on the Mount of Olives across from the temple complex, Peter, James, John, and Andrew asked Him privately,
“Tell us, when will these things happen? And what will be the sign when all these things are about to take place?”
Then Jesus began by telling them: “Watch out that no one deceives you.
